data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
Table 3.   Percent distribution of expenditure for the justice system by type of government, fiscal 2000
Notes:  Local government data are estimates subject to variability. Population figures are from the bureau of the Census, Current Population, Series P-25, No. 1045, July 2000.
a/ Total direct expenditures include outlays of States and all types of local governments including independent school districts
and special districts , which are not displayed separately.   The "Local, total" lines, which include these districts, will not equal the sum of the "Counties" and "Municipalities" lines.
